text: Socialist Youth of Spain () is the youth organisation of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE) in Spain. Headquartered in Madrid, the organization was founded in 1906 and is aligned internationally with the Young European Socialists and the International Union of Socialist Youth. Autonomous from the PSOE, one of the distinguishing marks of the organization is the demand for the Republic in Spain. ==External links== * Official homepage of Juventudes Socialistas ==References== Category:Spanish Socialist Workers' Party Category:Youth wings of political parties in Spain Category:Youth wings of social democratic parties
title: Socialist Youth of Spain
